name: werthog42
text: that owl is just full of anger

name: catachresis
text: It was my avatar elsewhere for a good month or so

name: ketamind
text: Majubu.

name: bixschmix
text: Please tell me it was animated, just glaring as hard and can be back and forth.

name: rykan
text: I may have to make that avatar.

name: headphones
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: headphones
text: [IMGS OFF]

name: bixschmix
text: Hurrah to you, good sir.

name: terriblerobot
text: Anybody got a link to this picture (I assume it is a .gif of the pissed off owl)?

name: neitherman
text: In general owls look like smug jerks, Onstad just took creative liberty with the one in his comic.

name: epicurus
text:
Can we see the owl appear in a few more? His furious little face is actually growing on me.

Also kudos for working in a Monty Python reference without going overboard on it.

name: saint
text: Chubbied for furious little face. Something about that struck me madly comical.

name: agika
text: A comment left by agika was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pityparty, masterofmetroid, riotdejaneiro, Overmedicated, Mr_Pete, redion, SchnappM, TonyHighwind, yellowcardigan, bug, equinn2006, waldo913, JuanCarlos, Sargasm, atticusonline, brzbee, Firehawk, Mastronaut)

name: odei
text: It's not lame to have opinions, guys! Agika, you are rad! You...are...rad!

name: centipede_damascus
text: I think I'd like to see more of AKKOLADE acutally. Seems a cultured sort of fellow.

name: luckypyjamas
text: even with his weird skeleton

name: zem
text: came here to post "I'd like to see more of AKKOLADE" but you had already posted this so thanks a lot asshole

name: waldo913
text: Screamed the angry beatnik.

name: lucid
text: I also find AKKOLADE amusing, but generally the concept of a group of eccentric rich folk is rife with comedic potential if done right.

name: kazad
text: A comment left by kazad was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by qleblat, atticusonline, kochipoik)

name: 1iwikiwi3
text: ^^ his expression with the sigh is the icing on my cake

name: pohlhoud
text: I really liked Bensington Butters. Its a shame we lost him in that mexico arc. Player was a good rival for Ray.

name: connellingus
text: I guess since he's wearing sunglasses now, Butters being proud of his eyes was merely his 'thang from a couple of years ago.

name: closefriend
text: AKKOLADE is really, really creepy.

name: plummet
text: retract, dogg.  do not diss AKKOLADE on my watch

name: gumfish
text: What kind of syndicate is this, anyway?

name: heyman
text: The players syndicate of course

name: tekende
text: It's not any "kind" of syndicate. It's just the Syndicate.

name: mikeleffel2
text: Much love for the Achewood owl.

name: imbeta
text: Nice nudge to the Pythons... you sir, are a Comedic Scholar.

name: epicurus
text: Ray's manner of speaking always takes a turn for the pimp when the syndicate is on his mind.

name: quantumcasaba
text: Rocky should make another appearance.

name: fosters
text: The Butters thing is what makes this strip for me. I imagine he's reading them out loud.

name: deusoma
text: Personally, I really like the image of a guy calling a press conference, and then just sitting silently at the front of the room, ignoring the press.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Roast Beef: I got to cook up basically some late-night nachos

name: chetyre
text:
I, too, have experienced Roast Beef's pain. I haven't been reading the blogs (though I have been using my extra chubbies on them) but I now realized my mistake.

As a sidenote, it is cruel on my eyes to go from that solid black background back to assetbar's white.

name: xiaomimi
text: Yeah, I'm gonna go ahead and blame my burgeoning cataracts on that.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Go not easy into that good night
Rage, rage against the dying of the light.

also I hope your insurance offers laser surgery.

name: kamet
text: 5 for the Monty Python reference alone...

name: clockworkorange
text: It's nice seeing a Monty Python reference that ISN'T from "Holy Grail".

name: dovey
text:
Originally a 3 before reading the alt-text and reviewing Rocky's facial expressions. Now a 4.

A solid 4.

name: plummet
text: AKKOLADE is back.

name: quantumcasaba
text: And his skeleton probably still looks weird.

name: i_love_kate
text:
I read this directly after recieving an e-mail from one of the people I consider my closest friends in which she told me that she finds my presence both irritating and uncomfortable, and wants me to leave her alone until forever.

I honestly smiled as hard as I ever have.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Not kate?!

name: rowboat
text: Rough chuckles sans chuckles.

name: adult_beverages
text: That owl looks hella pissed off.

name: octafish
text: That owl is not what he seems.
